newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks end 5.7 pct up as bull run continues.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks end 5.7 pct up as bull run continues.

text.p: Dhaka stocks closed 5.73 percent up on Saturday as the bull run continued amid fresh commitments by both institutional and small investors, brokers said.
The Dhaka Stock Exchange all-share index rose 171.17 points or 5.73 percent to 3,157.46 on a turnover of 415.3 million taka. Of 120 issues traded 107 rose, 11 lost and two were unchanged.

Bangladesh Tobacco Co gained 34.49 taka to 381.99, Beximco Pharma rose 37.68 to 414.68 and Reckitt & Colman was up 59.7 to 656.7. Brokers said there was renewed buying by retail investors. "Some big players were also involved in the trading," one broker said. -- Dhaka Newsroom +880-2-506363
